MAIN_MESSAGE: There is an unplanned power cut affecting the CW11 postcode area of Sandbach, affecting properties in Congleton Road, Holmes Chapel Road and surrounding streets. It will be necessary for our engineers to carry out an emergency shutdown at 8:00PM due to a faulty electricity pole. Our team will be carrying out repair work safely on the overhead line network and this may affect the supply to your property. We will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible, and we expect the power to be restored by Midnight. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 5:43PM on 18th February 2021.
